trans-unit.source: Upgrade Deployment
trans-unit.target: Upgrade Deployment

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Upgrade Deployment</languageKeyword> asynchronous operation initiates an update of role instances in a deployment using the package and configuration that you specify.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Upgrade Deployment</languageKeyword> asynchronous operation initiates an update of role instances in a deployment using the package and configuration that you specify.

trans-unit.source: For more information about updating role instances, see <legacyLink xlink:href="438b1ccc-5e8c-4e63-8f7f-d0f0bdf881d7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update an Azure Service</legacyLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about updating role instances, see <legacyLink xlink:href="438b1ccc-5e8c-4e63-8f7f-d0f0bdf881d7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update an Azure Service</legacyLink>.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Upgrade Deployment</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Upgrade Deployment</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-slot%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with <languageKeyword>staging</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>production</languageKeyword>, or <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the deployment.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;cloudservice-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the cloud service, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-slot%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with <languageKeyword>staging</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>production</languageKeyword>, or <codeInline>%%amp;lt;deployment-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of the deployment.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: POST
trans-unit.target: POST

trans-unit.source: POST
trans-unit.target: POST

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: URI Parameter
trans-unit.target: URI Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the deployment must be updated.
trans-unit.target: Specifies that the deployment must be updated.

trans-unit.source: Request Headers
trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the request headers.

trans-unit.source: Request Header
trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Set this header to <languageKeyword>application/xml</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: Set this header to <languageKeyword>application/xml</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: This header should be set to <userInput>2009-10-01</userInput> or higher.
trans-unit.target: This header should be set to <userInput>2009-10-01</userInput> or higher.

trans-unit.source: For more information about versioning headers, see <link xlink:href="bb009293-529c-4793-b925-0f8701f337d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Versioning</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about versioning headers, see <link xlink:href="bb009293-529c-4793-b925-0f8701f337d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Management Versioning</link>.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: The format of the request body is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the request body is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements in the request body.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements in the request body.

trans-unit.source: Element name
trans-unit.target: Element name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Mode
trans-unit.target: Mode

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of update to initiate.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the type of update to initiate.

trans-unit.source: Role instances are allocated to update domains when the service is deployed.
trans-unit.target: Role instances are allocated to update domains when the service is deployed.

trans-unit.source: Updates can be initiated manually in each update domain or initiated automatically in all update domains.
trans-unit.target: Updates can be initiated manually in each update domain or initiated automatically in all update domains.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: Possible values are:

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the default value is <languageKeyword>Auto</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: If not specified, the default value is <languageKeyword>Auto</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: If set to <languageKeyword>Manual</languageKeyword>, <link xlink:href="WalkUpgradeDomain" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">WalkUpgradeDomain</link> must be called to apply the update.
trans-unit.target: If set to <languageKeyword>Manual</languageKeyword>, <link xlink:href="WalkUpgradeDomain" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">WalkUpgradeDomain</link> must be called to apply the update.

trans-unit.source: If set to <languageKeyword>Auto</languageKeyword>, the update is automatically applied to each update domain in sequence.
trans-unit.target: If set to <languageKeyword>Auto</languageKeyword>, the update is automatically applied to each update domain in sequence.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Simultaneous</languageKeyword> setting is only available in version 2012-12-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Simultaneous</languageKeyword> setting is only available in version 2012-12-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: PackageUrl
trans-unit.target: PackageUrl

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a URL that refers to the location of the service package in the Blob service.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a URL that refers to the location of the service package in the Blob service.

trans-unit.source: The service package can be located either in a storage account beneath the same subscription or a Shared Access Signature (SAS) URI from any storage account.
trans-unit.target: The service package can be located either in a storage account beneath the same subscription or a Shared Access Signature (SAS) URI from any storage account.

trans-unit.source: For more info about Shared Access Signatures, see <link xlink:href="98f3411e-d85d-4be9-809e-135b3d4ed436" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Using a Shared Access Signature</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more info about Shared Access Signatures, see <link xlink:href="98f3411e-d85d-4be9-809e-135b3d4ed436" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Using a Shared Access Signature</link>.

trans-unit.source: Configuration
trans-unit.target: Configuration

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the base-64 encoded service configuration file for the deployment.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the base-64 encoded service configuration file for the deployment.

trans-unit.source: Label
trans-unit.target: Label

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies name for the cloud service that is base-64 encoded.
trans-unit.target: Specifies name for the cloud service that is base-64 encoded.

trans-unit.source: The name may be up to 100 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: The name may be up to 100 characters in length.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that the label be unique within the subscription.
trans-unit.target: It is recommended that the label be unique within the subscription.

trans-unit.source: The name can be used identify the cloud service for your tracking purposes.
trans-unit.target: The name can be used identify the cloud service for your tracking purposes.

trans-unit.source: RoleToUpgrade
trans-unit.target: RoleToUpgrade

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the specific role instance to update.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the specific role instance to update.

trans-unit.source: Force
trans-unit.target: Force

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the update should proceed even when it will cause local data to be lost from some role instances.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether the update should proceed even when it will cause local data to be lost from some role instances.

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>True</languageKeyword> if the update should proceed; otherwise <languageKeyword>false</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>True</languageKeyword> if the update should proceed; otherwise <languageKeyword>false</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Force</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2011-10-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Force</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2011-10-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Name

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of an extended cloud service property.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of an extended cloud service property.

trans-unit.source: Each extended property must have both a defined name and value.
trans-unit.target: Each extended property must have both a defined name and value.

trans-unit.source: You can have a maximum of 25 extended property name and value pairs.
trans-unit.target: You can have a maximum of 25 extended property name and value pairs.

trans-unit.source: The maximum length of the <languageKeyword>Name</languageKeyword> element is 64 characters, only alphanumeric characters and underscores are valid in the name, and the name must start with a letter.
trans-unit.target: The maximum length of the <languageKeyword>Name</languageKeyword> element is 64 characters, only alphanumeric characters and underscores are valid in the name, and the name must start with a letter.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to use other characters, starting with a non-letter character, or entering a name that is identical to that of another extended property owned by the same cloud service, will result in a status code 400 (Bad Request) error.
trans-unit.target: Attempting to use other characters, starting with a non-letter character, or entering a name that is identical to that of another extended property owned by the same cloud service, will result in a status code 400 (Bad Request) error.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Name</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Name</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Value

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of an extended cloud service property.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the value of an extended cloud service property.

trans-unit.source: Each extended property must have both a defined name and value.
trans-unit.target: Each extended property must have both a defined name and value.

trans-unit.source: You can have a maximum of 25 extended property name and value pairs, and each extended property value has a maximum length of 255 characters.
trans-unit.target: You can have a maximum of 25 extended property name and value pairs, and each extended property value has a maximum length of 255 characters.

trans-unit.source: You delete an extended property by setting the value to NULL.
trans-unit.target: You delete an extended property by setting the value to NULL.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Value</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Value</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2012-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an extension that is added to the cloud service.
trans-unit.target: Specifies an extension that is added to the cloud service.

trans-unit.source: In Azure, a process can run as an extension of a cloud service.
trans-unit.target: In Azure, a process can run as an extension of a cloud service.

trans-unit.source: You must add an extension to the cloud service by using <link xlink:href="4745de1c-a555-424c-b9c4-b3c116f1f553" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Add Extension</link> before it can be added to the deployment during an update.
trans-unit.target: You must add an extension to the cloud service by using <link xlink:href="4745de1c-a555-424c-b9c4-b3c116f1f553" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Add Extension</link> before it can be added to the deployment during an update.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>ExtensionConfiguration</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2013-03-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>ExtensionConfiguration</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2013-03-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: ExtensionConfiguration
trans-unit.target: ExtensionConfiguration

trans-unit.source: Specifies an extension that is added to the cloud service.
trans-unit.target: Specifies an extension that is added to the cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Element name
trans-unit.target: Element name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: AllRoles
trans-unit.target: AllRoles

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of extensions that are applied to all roles in a deployment.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a list of extensions that are applied to all roles in a deployment.

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an extension that is to be deployed to a role in a cloud service.
trans-unit.target: Specifies an extension that is to be deployed to a role in a cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of extensions that are applied to specific roles in a deployment.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a list of extensions that are applied to specific roles in a deployment.

trans-unit.source: Extension
trans-unit.target: Extension

trans-unit.source: Specifies an extension that is to be deployed to a role in a cloud service.
trans-unit.target: Specifies an extension that is to be deployed to a role in a cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Element name
trans-unit.target: Element name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Id
trans-unit.target: Id

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the identifier of the extension.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the identifier of the extension.

trans-unit.source: The identifier is created when the extension is added to the cloud service.
trans-unit.target: The identifier is created when the extension is added to the cloud service.

trans-unit.source: You can find the Id of an extension that was added to a cloud service by using <link xlink:href="f07dafc0-34a8-4950-a9ad-533172d5cbc5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Extensions</link>.
trans-unit.target: You can find the Id of an extension that was added to a cloud service by using <link xlink:href="f07dafc0-34a8-4950-a9ad-533172d5cbc5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List Extensions</link>.

trans-unit.source: State
trans-unit.target: State

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the state of the extension.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the state of the extension.

trans-unit.source: This element only applies to JSON configured extensions.
trans-unit.target: This element only applies to JSON configured extensions.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: Possible values are:

trans-unit.source: The default value is <languageKeyword>Enable</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: The default value is <languageKeyword>Enable</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>State</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-06-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>State</languageKeyword> element is only available using version 2014-06-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: NamedRoles
trans-unit.target: NamedRoles

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of extensions that are applied to specific roles in a deployment.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a list of extensions that are applied to specific roles in a deployment.

trans-unit.source: Element name
trans-unit.target: Element name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Role
trans-unit.target: Role

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a specific role to which the extension is added.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a specific role to which the extension is added.

trans-unit.source: RoleName
trans-unit.target: RoleName

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the role.

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an extension that is to be deployed to a role in a cloud service.
trans-unit.target: Specifies an extension that is to be deployed to a role in a cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response Headers
trans-unit.target: Response Headers

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Response Header
trans-unit.target: Response Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.
trans-unit.target: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.

trans-unit.source: For an asynchronous operation, you can call <link xlink:href="1215ece5-cbef-4a85-a3db-ab6c20c2c6df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Operation Status</link> with the value of the header to determine whether the operation is complete, has failed, or is still in progress.
trans-unit.target: For an asynchronous operation, you can call <link xlink:href="1215ece5-cbef-4a85-a3db-ab6c20c2c6df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Operation Status</link> with the value of the header to determine whether the operation is complete, has failed, or is still in progress.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: Remarks

trans-unit.source: To perform an automatic update of a deployment, call <link xlink:href="a7b4059f-c6eb-4603-b2ea-8b25444fc092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Upgrade Deployment</link> or <link xlink:href="73bb79fb-3593-48d3-8666-f028ac7cc845" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Change Deployment Configuration</link> with the <languageKeyword>Mode</languageKeyword> element set to <languageKeyword>automatic</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: To perform an automatic update of a deployment, call <link xlink:href="a7b4059f-c6eb-4603-b2ea-8b25444fc092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Upgrade Deployment</link> or <link xlink:href="73bb79fb-3593-48d3-8666-f028ac7cc845" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Change Deployment Configuration</link> with the <languageKeyword>Mode</languageKeyword> element set to <languageKeyword>automatic</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: The update proceeds from that point without a need for further input.
trans-unit.target: The update proceeds from that point without a need for further input.

trans-unit.source: You can call <link xlink:href="1215ece5-cbef-4a85-a3db-ab6c20c2c6df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Operation Status</link> to determine when the update is complete.
trans-unit.target: You can call <link xlink:href="1215ece5-cbef-4a85-a3db-ab6c20c2c6df" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Operation Status</link> to determine when the update is complete.

trans-unit.source: To perform a manual update, first call <link xlink:href="a7b4059f-c6eb-4603-b2ea-8b25444fc092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Upgrade Deployment</link> with the <languageKeyword>Mode</languageKeyword> element set to <languageKeyword>manual</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: To perform a manual update, first call <link xlink:href="a7b4059f-c6eb-4603-b2ea-8b25444fc092" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Upgrade Deployment</link> with the <languageKeyword>Mode</languageKeyword> element set to <languageKeyword>manual</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: Next, call <link xlink:href="063f8c52-ca54-4840-a5fd-16eb8a165834" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Walk Upgrade Domain</link> to update each domain within the deployment.
trans-unit.target: Next, call <link xlink:href="063f8c52-ca54-4840-a5fd-16eb8a165834" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Walk Upgrade Domain</link> to update each domain within the deployment.

trans-unit.source: You should make sure that the operation is complete by calling Get Operation Status before updating the next domain.
trans-unit.target: You should make sure that the operation is complete by calling Get Operation Status before updating the next domain.

trans-unit.source: An update that adds or removes role instances will result in a configuration update to all roles that are deployed in the cloud service.
trans-unit.target: An update that adds or removes role instances will result in a configuration update to all roles that are deployed in the cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Existing role instances need to be notified of new role instances so that all role instances can communicate together in the cloud service.
trans-unit.target: Existing role instances need to be notified of new role instances so that all role instances can communicate together in the cloud service.

trans-unit.source: By default, a cloud service is deployed with five update domains, which are updated one at a time during an in-place update.
trans-unit.target: By default, a cloud service is deployed with five update domains, which are updated one at a time during an in-place update.

trans-unit.source: For information on modifying the number of update domains in the service definition file, see <link xlink:href="b7735dbf-8e91-4d1b-89f7-2f17e9302469" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Definition Schema</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information on modifying the number of update domains in the service definition file, see <link xlink:href="b7735dbf-8e91-4d1b-89f7-2f17e9302469" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Definition Schema</link>.

trans-unit.source: To determine the update domain in which a particular instance is running, use the <languageKeyword>UpdateDomain</languageKeyword> property of the <languageKeyword>RoleInstance</languageKeyword> class.
trans-unit.target: To determine the update domain in which a particular instance is running, use the <languageKeyword>UpdateDomain</languageKeyword> property of the <languageKeyword>RoleInstance</languageKeyword> class.
